---

### Request for Proposal: Expansion Joint, Pipe

**Tender Details:**

| Item | Description |
| --- | --- |
| **Reference Number** | PW-23-01026842 (Amendment 1) |
| **Solicitation Number** | W8482-231250/A |
| **Publication Date** | February 21, 2023 |
| **Closing Date** | April 18, 2023, 14:00:00 |
| **Modification Date** | April 3, 2023 |

**Procurement Information:**

| Description | Details |
| --- | --- |
| **Contracting Entity** | Department of National Defence |
| **End-User Entity** | Department of National Defence |
| **Contact** | Jean-Pierre Normandin |
| **Contact Email** | jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca |
| **Contact Phone** | 819-939-3674 |

### Description of Requirements

The Department of National Defence invites bidders to propose for the supply of Expansion Joints, Pipes, as detailed below:

| Item | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Item 1 | GSIN: 4730, NIBS, Unit of Issue: EA (each) |
| Item 2 | GSIN: 4730, NIBS, Unit of Issue: EA (each) |

*   6 units, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt
*   9 units, to be delivered to CFB Halifax

### Requirements and Preferences

*   Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.
*   Canadian Content: The requirement is subject to a preference for Canadian Goods and Services (CFTA).
*   Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
*   Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars.

### Procurement Method

*   Competitive - Open bidding

### Languages

*   Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

### Attachments

*   Amendment 1 (PW-23-01026842-001): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/04/03/c9c3cfd8f3220b4eba5f8359a5b9e00b/w8482-231250_amendment001_en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/
